title: #770 - Sam Tripoli
description:
Sam Tripoli, a stand up comedian and host of the, "Tin Foil Hat" and "Punch Drunk," podcasts, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:
